title: Old sewing machines.
content:
Two for sale as working antiques in a sewing shop in Whitstable, Kent, UK. The other neglected in my partner's mother's garage. Bytom, Poland.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095907im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Singer_5315.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095907im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Frister_6228.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095907im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Kohler_4868.jpg)

My Picasa web album of found lettering, signs and possibly a bit of type can be found [here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095907/http:/picasaweb.google.co.uk/justin.chodzko/SignsPostersLetteringAndType?authkey=Gv1sRgCKHDsNe9t_iK5wE#)
author: Justin_Ch
